title: ConvertDset
description: Converts a surface dataset from one format to another.

dset_labels.title: Dataset Labels
dset_labels.description: Label the columns (sub-bricks) of the output dataset

add_node_index.title: Add Node Index
add_node_index.description: Add a node index element if one does not exist in the input dataset

node_select_file.title: Node Select File
node_select_file.description: File specifying the nodes to keep in the output

prepend_node_index.title: Prepend Node Index
prepend_node_index.description: Add a node index column to the data

pad_to_node.title: Pad to Node
pad_to_node.description: Output a full dataset from node 0 to MAX_INDEX

labelize.title: Labelize
labelize.description: Turn the dataset into a labeled set per the colormap in CMAP

graphize.title: Graphize
graphize.description: Turn the dataset into a SUMA graph dataset

graph_nodelist.title: Graph Node List
graph_nodelist.description: Two files specifying the indices and the coordinates of the graph's nodes

graph_full_nodelist.title: Graph Full Node List
graph_full_nodelist.description: Similar to -graph_nodelist_1D but without need for NODEINDLIST.1D

graph_named_nodelist.title: Graph Named Node List
graph_named_nodelist.description: Two files specifying graph node indices, string labels, and their coordinates

graph_xyz_lpi.title: Graph XYZ LPI
graph_xyz_lpi.description: Coordinates in NodeList.1D are in LPI instead of RAI

graph_edgelist.title: Graph Edge List
graph_edgelist.description: Indices of graph nodes defining edge

onegraph.title: Onegraph
onegraph.description: Expect input dataset to be one square matrix defining the graph (default)

multigraph.title: Multigraph
multigraph.description: Expect each column in input dataset to define an entire graph

split.title: Split
split.description: Split a multi-column dataset into about N output datasets

no_history.title: No History
no_history.description: Do not include a history element in the output
